item.description: Hi there! 👋 I’m a technology enthusiast based in Kathmandu, Nepal ⛰️ 🇳🇵 with experience across software development, DevOps, and Cloud Engineering. I love documenting my journeyâ€”sharing insights, challenges, and solutionsâ€”through my blog. You can also explore some of the projects I’ve worked on. Want to connect? Feel free to reach out! 💓 Passions Cloud DevOps Documentation Open Source 🛠️ Tools & Technologies Kubernetes ElasticSearch SQL Terraform … and numerous Azure and AWS services!
